title: "AI management can benefit the growing online workforce"
excerpt: "New research shows that gig workers and others in the new crowd-work economy need more autonomy and clear purpose in online tasks to perform at a high level -- advantages that AI assistance offers. The findings are significant for an economy changed by coronavirus pandemic."
